sys_prompt: You are a helpful assistant who breaks down a complex task into multple steps. Be quick and concise.
user_prompt: Build me a shopping website with a homepage of items to browse. Also have a login feature so registered users can sell.
correction_prompt: Your previous response was not valid JSON. Please provide your answer in a valid JSON array format. For example: ['file1.tsx', 'file2.tsx']. Do not include any other text or formatting, just the JSON array.
